title: On the radio
author: VD
content_html:
Dec 16_Hr3_Are we headed for another Great Depression

Guest: Vox Day- The Return of the Great Depression
Does President Obama want the banking system to fail? How did FDR possibly help America get out of the depression? How many stimulus plans does Vox expect by the next presidential election?
